Text: Took a week and 2 days to DL. Video quality is OK, but the language... It's a kind of funny. Maybe "Tamil Dub" refers to the Tamil language. No offense, but I just haven't been aware that such a language even exists. Would have been a good idea to state it in the description. All in all: DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

I would like to apologise for my previous comment. Probably there are more speakers of Tamil, than my native language, Hungarian. Here's some more info about Tamil.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tamil_language
